item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】Dolby Atmos - Alphaville - Forever Young [E-AC3 JOC | 16-bit 48 kHz | 5.1 | 1024 kb/s]
item.description:
Genre: Electronic
Style: Synth-pop
Year: 1984 (Atmos Mix: 2021)
Source: Blu-ray (40th Anniversary)

"Forever Young" is the debut studio album by German synth-pop band Alphaville. It was released on 27 September 1984 by Warner Music Group. Four singles supported the album, "Big in Japan", "Sounds Like a Melody", "Forever Young", and "Jet Set". The album charted well, hitting the Top 20 in six European countries and reaching number 1 in Norway and Sweden. Reviews were generally positive, with one reviewer calling it "a classic synth pop album" and "a wonderfully fun ride from start to finish."

On 15 March 2019, the album was remastered for the first time for its 35th anniversary. On July 5, 2024 a Blu-ray version of the album was released to celebrate the 40th anniversary. It includes a lossless Atmos Mix and a stereo remaster (24-bit 48 kHz).

Tracklist
01. A Victory Of Love 4:14
02. Summer In Berlin 4:45
03. Big In Japan 4:43
04. To Germany With Love 4:15
05. Fallen Angel 3:55
06. Forever Young 3:45
07. In The Mood 4:29
08. Sounds Like A Melody 4:42
09. Lies 3:32
10. The Jet Set 4:52

Release Info
The source is of this release is the Dolby Atmos track from the Blu-ray release.
Encoded to "Dolby Digital+ with Dolby Atmos" with Dolby Media Encoder.

You must reply before you can see the hidden data contained here.
item.author: ADHDerby
